channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Denim & Co
channel.desc: Join us to see Denim & Co's clothing range offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Best of QVC Style
channel.desc: Catch all the recent highlights from our sister channel with the Best of QVC Style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: In the Garden with Thompson & Morgan
channel.desc: Enjoy gorgeous plants and flowers in your garden from Thompson & Morgan, one of the UK's oldest horticulture firms and an established household name for gardeners across the country.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Style for the Season
channel.desc: Next season's style starts here. Showcasing the very latest in fashion, from fabulous dresses to gorgeous skirts, this show is your ticket to brilliant dressing in a flash.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Accessories by Kipling
channel.desc: Showcasing the fashionable and classic bags created by this international brand, including handbags, rucksacks, travel bags and weekend away bags.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Denim & Co Sale
channel.desc: Join us to see terrific bargains from Denim & Co.'s clothing range, offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Marla Wynne Fashion Collection
channel.desc: Update your wardrobe for the new year with gorgeous Wynne Layers fashion from MarlaWynne, featuring layering pieces, scarves and more to help give every outfit the perfect finishing touch.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Finery London
channel.desc: Tune in to see the modern and sophisticated Finery London womenswear range, with a focus on stylish detail and beautiful fabrics to make sure your wardrobe reflects your individuality.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Style for the Season
channel.desc: Next season's style starts here. Showcasing the very latest in fashion, from fabulous dresses to gorgeous skirts, this show is your ticket to brilliant dressing in a flash.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Diamonique Spectacular
channel.desc: Find the perfect sparkle with this dazzling collection of Diamonique simulated diamonds. You can enjoy all the glamour and style of diamonds without the price tag.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Best of QVC Style
channel.desc: Catch all the recent highlights from our sister channel with the Best of QVC Style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Ben de Lisi Sale
channel.desc: Bag yourself some fabulous fashion deals with Ben de Lisi, who offers style staples that encapsulate modern elegance, from stunning dresses to chic separates. Discover what's on offer in this show.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: The Jewellery Box
channel.desc: Indulge yourself in our collection of fine, exquisite jewellery. Each piece in our glamorous selection epitomises the height of luxury. Go on, you deserve it.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: MarlaWynne Fashion
channel.desc: Easy care, easy wear, easy elegance in this mix and match collection of unique and versatile pieces created for the smart, elegant, busy women seeking comfort that doesn't compromise style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: MarlaWynne Fashion
channel.desc: Easy care, easy wear, easy elegance in this mix and match collection of unique and versatile pieces created for the smart, elegant, busy women seeking comfort that doesn't compromise style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Footwear with Blowfish Malibu
channel.desc: With specially chosen products from across the QVC range, there's something for everyone in the QVC Selection.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Frank Usher Fashion Sale
channel.desc: Frank Usher fans, you won't want to miss this: an hour of fab Sale offers from across this iconic fashion and accessory range. Add sparkle, glamour and effortless style to your wardrobe for less.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Morning Style Edit
channel.desc: Every Wednesday at 11am here on QVC Style, we'll be offering hints, tips and advice on looking your best, along with another look at fabulous fashion from the Morning Style show with Kathy.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Summer Sandals with Blowfish
channel.desc: Summer Sandals with Blowfish.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Apricot Clothing Sale
channel.desc: Discover fashion at great prices from Apricot - it's what every woman's wardrobe needs, from well produced staples, through to limited edition and trend-led fashion pieces.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Frank Usher
channel.desc: Discover elegant clothing and accessories from Frank Usher. Designed for the modern woman, these beautiful designs will add a touch of sparkle and glamour to your wardrobe with comfort in mind.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Accessories by Kipling
channel.desc: Showcasing the fashionable and classic bags created by this international brand, including handbags, rucksacks, travel bags and weekend away bags.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Centigrade up to 50% off
channel.desc: Whatever your outerwear needs, Centigrade has it covered! You'll find a wide variety of coats and jackets in different styles, designs and materials - all with up to 50% off.
